name: Export Gravity Forms entries to Google Sheets
description: This template helps you export all entries from a specific Gravity Form to Google Sheets. The template use [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1x6PxBJctqsPVk2_cUspzVcDTLsFz2i-ksMceVElQEdQ/edit?usp=sharing).
